ResourceHeader.ResourceName: CLU3 STAFF-SC Calibrated Magnetic Field Waveform (ISR2)
ResourceHeader.Description:
This dataset contains measurements of the magnetic field Calibrated WaveForm from the STAFF-SC instrument in NBR mode (filtered from 0.1 Hz to 10 Hz and sampled at 25 Hz) and in HBR mode (filtered from 0.1 Hz to 180 Hz and sampled at 450 Hz) and DC magnetic field components in the spin plane BDCx, BDCy, on the Cluster C3 spacecraft.
This product is given in the ISR2 frame.
Data calibration is performed using a moving window of 1024 points in NBR mode and 4096 points in HBR mode.
These values were chosen as the best compromise for routine production.

Parameter.Name: Cluster 3 STAFF DC magnetic field components in the spin plane
Parameter.Description: Cluster 3 STAFF DC magnetic field components in the spin plane BDCx, BDCy
